Game information:  


The Vanishing of Ethan Carter is a mystical adventure game
from the first person. No fights and explosions, just study
and research, only the search for truth. You will play a
detective Paul Prospero, who received a strange letter from
Ethan Carter. Suspecting that the boy is in danger, Paul comes
to his house, where everything is much worse than Paul could have
imagined. Instead, he discovers Ethan traces of brutal
murders in which he and to understand.


RePack Features:  
The Vanishing of Ethan Carter
Includes Update 2
Do not cut / recoded
